data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Singh, Sudhir, Singh, Karan Pal (2011): Description of two new species of Psyllaephagus Ashmead (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae) parasitizing Phacopteron lentiginosum Buckton (Hemiptera: Psyllidae), a leaf gall-former of Garuga pinnata Roxburgh (Burseraceae). Zootaxa 2885: 33-43, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277604
